thread.title: Red Bulls' Mike Grella scores fastest goal in MLS history
thread.title_full: Red Bulls' Mike Grella scores fastest goal in MLS history

author: Nate Scott
title: Red Bulls' Mike Grella scores fastest goal in MLS history
text:
Red Bulls' Mike Grella scores fastest goal in MLS history USA Today Sports 9 hrs ago Nate Scott Mike Grella of the New York Red Bulls stunned everyone by intercepting a pass in the opening moments of his team’s game against Philadelphia, dribbling up the field, and scoring a goal. It happened in seven seconds — the fastest goal in MLS history.
AdChoices © Provided by USA Today Sports 1Lttqzz I’ve seen goals scored very, very quickly in soccer games before. But to score a goal that fast when you don’t even start with possession? The other team had the ball, and Grella still only needs seven seconds to score.
Grella’s goal is being called the fastest in MLS history. Tim Cahill, also of the Red Bulls, scored a goal in seven seconds in 2013. Grella’s I’m guessing is a hair faster.
(Thanks to NBC Sports for sharing.)
